CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 17, 1955, pg. A29, reads: "Aware Of Heritage - These senior high school winners standing with Mrs. Morrie Mayer, chairman of the art poster committee of the B'nai B'rith Women's Council of Greater Pittsburgh, not only had to show ability but an awareness of our democratic heritage in their paintings. They are John Schleder of Perry, Fred Robinson of Westinghouse and Ronald Schwerin of Allderdice. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Mrs. Morrie Mayer, standing with students John Schleder, Fred Robinson, and Ronald Schwerin, holding winning artworks judged by the B'nai B'rith Women's Council of Greater Pittsburgh, posed in room in Board of Education, Oakland
